description: This file defines a Flutter widget called HomeScreen, which displays a welcome message and includes a logout button that interacts with authentication state and navigation.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that acts as the main screen, showing a welcome message and providing a logout functionality.

methods.name: _logout
methods.description: Handles user logout by calling AuthState.logout() and navigating to the login route, clearing previous routes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the HomeScreen, including app bar, logout button, and welcome text.
